20101226021455.000|20101226021455.000|CC1|                        3Q      
20101226021455.000|20101226021456.000|CC1|       COPD makes it hard       
20101226021456.000|20101226021458.000|CC1|       for me to breathe.       
20101226021458.000|20101226021458.000|CC1|        But with ADVAIR,        
20101226021458.000|20101226021501.000|CC1|      I'm breathing better.     
20101226021501.000|20101226021501.000|CC1| So now, I can join the fun and 
20101226021501.000|20101226021504.000|CC1|  games with my grandchildren.  
20101226021504.000|20101226021506.000|CC1|           Great news!          
20101226021506.000|20101226021506.000|CC1|      For people with COPD,     
20101226021506.000|20101226021508.000|CC1|  including chronic bronchitis, 
20101226021508.000|20101226021510.000|CC1|       emphysema, or both,      
20101226021510.000|20101226021510.000|CC1|   ADVAIR helps significantly   
20101226021510.000|20101226021512.000|CC1|     improve lung function.     
20101226021512.000|20101226021514.000|CC1| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101226021514.000|20101226021514.000|CC1|  ADVAIR is different from most 
20101226021514.000|20101226021517.000|CC1|     other COPD medications     
20101226021517.000|20101226021517.000|CC1|       because it contains      
20101226021517.000|20101226021520.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20101226021520.000|20101226021520.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20101226021520.000|20101226021522.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20101226021522.000|20101226021522.000|CC1|        working together        
20101226021522.000|20101226021523.000|CC1|   to help you breathe better.  
20101226021523.000|20101226021523.000|CC1|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101226021523.000|20101226021527.000|CC1|  inhalers for sudden symptoms  
20101226021527.000|20101226021527.000|CC1|        and should not be       
20101226021527.000|20101226021529.000|CC1|   used more than twice a day.  
20101226021529.000|20101226021531.000|CC1| People with COPD taking ADVAIR 
20101226021531.000|20101226021531.000|CC1|    may have a higher chance    
20101226021531.000|20101226021533.000|CC1|          of pneumonia.         
20101226021533.000|20101226021533.000|CC1|       ADVAIR may increase      
20101226021533.000|20101226021535.000|CC1|    your risk of osteoporosis   
20101226021535.000|20101226021536.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20101226021536.000|20101226021536.000|CC1|        Tell your doctor        
20101226021536.000|20101226021538.000|CC1|  if you have a heart condition 
20101226021538.000|20101226021538.000|CC1|     or high blood pressure     
20101226021538.000|20101226021540.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.

20101226025623.000|20101226025748.000|SEG_01|Type=Commercial
20101226025623.000|20101226025623.000|CC1|          3Q                    
20101226025623.000|20101226025623.000|CC1|       COPD makes it hard       
20101226025623.000|20101226025625.000|CC1|       for me to breathe.       
20101226025625.000|20101226025625.000|CC1|        But with ADVAIR,        
20101226025625.000|20101226025628.000|CC1|      I'm breathing better.     
20101226025628.000|20101226025628.000|CC1| So now, I can join the fun and 
20101226025628.000|20101226025631.000|CC1|  games with my grandchildren.  
20101226025631.000|20101226025633.000|CC1|           Great news!          
20101226025633.000|20101226025633.000|CC1|      For people with COPD,     
20101226025633.000|20101226025636.000|CC1|  including chronic bronchitis, 
20101226025636.000|20101226025637.000|CC1|       emphysema, or both,      
20101226025637.000|20101226025637.000|CC1|   ADVAIR helps significantly   
20101226025637.000|20101226025640.000|CC1|     improve lung function.     
20101226025640.000|20101226025642.000|CC1| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101226025642.000|20101226025642.000|CC1|  ADVAIR is different from most 
20101226025642.000|20101226025644.000|CC1|     other COPD medications     
20101226025644.000|20101226025644.000|CC1|       because it contains      
20101226025644.000|20101226025647.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20101226025647.000|20101226025647.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20101226025647.000|20101226025649.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20101226025649.000|20101226025649.000|CC1|        working together        
20101226025649.000|20101226025651.000|CC1|   to help you breathe better.  
20101226025651.000|20101226025651.000|CC1|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101226025651.000|20101226025654.000|CC1|  inhalers for sudden symptoms  
20101226025654.000|20101226025654.000|CC1|        and should not be       
20101226025654.000|20101226025656.000|CC1|   used more than twice a day.  
20101226025656.000|20101226025658.000|CC1| People with COPD taking ADVAIR 
20101226025658.000|20101226025658.000|CC1|    may have a higher chance    
20101226025658.000|20101226025700.000|CC1|          of pneumonia.         
20101226025700.000|20101226025700.000|CC1|       ADVAIR may increase      
20101226025700.000|20101226025702.000|CC1|    your risk of osteoporosis   
20101226025702.000|20101226025704.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20101226025704.000|20101226025704.000|CC1|        Tell your doctor        
20101226025704.000|20101226025706.000|CC1|  if you have a heart condition 
20101226025706.000|20101226025706.000|CC1|     or high blood pressure     
20101226025706.000|20101226025708.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.     
20101226025708.000|20101226025709.000|CC1|    I had fun today, Grandpa.   
20101226025709.000|20101226025712.000|CC1|                You and me both.
20101226025712.000|20101226025712.000|CC1|   If COPD is still making it   
20101226025712.000|20101226025714.000|CC1|        hard to breathe,        
20101226025714.000|20101226025714.000|CC1|         ask your doctor
